description: Update Tenna vehicle trailer, tractor, or equipment assignments.
permissions: Admin users can update Tenna vehicles. Non-admin users can update vehicles only if they are members of the vehicle's broker organization.
side_effects: Updates Tenna vehicle trailer/tractor/equipment relationships. When a trailer or tractor is first assigned, the server may enqueue asynchronous vehicle location event creation for that vehicle.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument for the Tenna vehicle ID. At least one of --tractor, --trailer, or --equipment must be provided. Passing an empty string for a relationship clears that assignment. When both trailer and tractor are set, they must belong to the same trucker; when broker and trucker are present, they must match.

flags.name: --tractor
flags.validation: Example: 456. Use empty string to clear assignment.

flags.name: --trailer
flags.validation: Example: 789. Use empty string to clear assignment.

flags.name: --equipment
flags.validation: Example: 321. Use empty string to clear assignment.
